What is the role of TEOA in the synthesis of compound 5?
data.answer: TEOA serves as the solvent and is incorporated into compound 5 as extraframework charge-balancing species.

What is the main structural feature of the In3+ site in all of the structures?
data.answer: Each In3+ site is 4-connected and bonded to four carboxylate ligands.

data.question: Which compound's synthesis does not involve DMF as a solvent?

data.answer: They affect the gas adsorption properties by varying degrees of pore blockage.

What is the common feature of the anionic frameworks mentioned in the text?
data.answer: They contain size-tunable, ion-exchangeable extraframework organic cations.
